comment._content: Tatyana Alexeyevna Afanasyeva, aka Tatiana Eherenfest (1876-1964): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tatyana_Afanasyeva Mathematician, collaborated with her husband Paul Ehrenfest, also wrote papers about entropy, randomness, and mathematics education.
